name: Speedrun Stylus Dev Environment
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'echo "üîç Verifying pre-installed tools..." && node --version && yarn --version && rustc --version && cargo --version && (cargo-stylus --version || true) && (forge --version || true) && echo "‚úÖ Tools verified"; echo "üîß Waiting for Docker to be ready..."; timeout=60; elapsed=0; while ! docker info >/dev/null 2>&1; do if [ $elapsed -ge $timeout ]; then echo "‚ùå Docker failed to start within ${timeout}s"; exit 1; fi; sleep 2; elapsed=$((elapsed + 2)); done; echo "‚úÖ Docker is ready"; docker --version; if [ -f yarn.lock ]; then echo "üì¶ Installing yarn dependencies..." && yarn install --frozen-lockfile; else echo "‚ÑπÔ∏è yarn.lock not found ‚Äî skipping install"; fi'
postStartCommand: bash -lc 'echo "‚è≥ Waiting for Docker daemon..."; timeout=60; elapsed=0; while ! docker ps >/dev/null 2>&1; do if [ $elapsed -ge $timeout ]; then echo "‚ùå Docker daemon failed to start within ${timeout}s"; exit 1; fi; sleep 2; elapsed=$((elapsed + 2)); done; echo "‚úÖ Codespace started ‚Äî Docker is ready."'
